name: Vibin'Vendetta
storyline:
Story 1: The residents of Vibing With the Gang wake up one day to see that their beloved VC limit has gone missing! Six upstanding citizens - Lilbros, Beeni, Yellow, Matoh, Sumby, and Majik - stand up to the challenge, and head off to find out who the mysterious captor is, and take them down. Will they be able to rescue their precious VC limit and save the day? Or will they become a pile of wheat cakes, crumbling under their failure

Story 2: Reiiko, the innovative owner of Vibing With The Gang, unveils the BRAND NEW food bot, only to have it snatched by a mysterious, jolly man after crafting a chicken sandwich. Now, five hungry warriors - Fam, Jade, Pike, and Sheen - must embark on a mission to retrieve their invention from his elusive grasp. Will they reclaim their bot and restore culinary harmony, or will this enigmatic theft leave them in a flavorless quandary?
summary: VIBINVENDETTA is a traditional fighting game inspired by classic flash games from the early 2000s. You play as 14 different characters from the group known as Vibing With the Gang, with their own unique powers and fighting styles, across two different stories and twenty stages. The game is still actively being developed, with it currently in it's second version.
